Subject: Heritrix WriterProcessor
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=475161324

Hi all,
         I have wriitten a WriterProcessor which serves my needs to=
 replace the ARCWriterProcessor for Heritrix 3.0. However, when I run Herit=
rix 3.0 with my WriterProcessor then it correctly downloads the contents of=
 the seeds I supply and also the robots.txt files. However it does not down=
load the contents for the URLs generated after the seed. The log file gives=
 the following message for all URLs generated after the seeds:

2011-02-21 =
11:07:44.708 SEVERE thread-14 org.archive.modules.fetcher.FetchDNS.storeDNS=
Record() Failed store of DNS Record for dns:search.yahoo.com
java.io.IOExce=
ption: RIS already open for ToeThread #15: dns:search.yahoo.com
        at =
org.archive.io.RecordingInputStream.open(RecordingInputStream.java:84)
    =
    at org.archive.util.Recorder.inputWrap(Recorder.java:144)
        at or=
g.archive.modules.fetcher.FetchDNS.recordDNS(FetchDNS.java:271)
        at =
org.archive.modules.fetcher.FetchDNS.storeDNSRecord(FetchDNS.java:216)
    =
    at org.archive.modules.fetcher.FetchDNS.innerProcess(FetchDNS.java:171)=

        at org.archive.modules.Processor.innerProcessResult(Processor.java=
:177)
        at org.archive.modules.Processor.process(Processor.java:144)
=
        at org.archive.modules.ProcessorChain.process(ProcessorChain.java:1=
31)
        at org.archive.crawler.framework.ToeThread.run(ToeThread.java:1=
46)

It says that RIS is already open. However in my code I have not made u=
se of the ReplayInputStream at all and am just making use of the CrawlURI a=
nd then using the openstream() function to download the contents. I am not =
quite clear about the tasks that are done in innerprocess() function of the=
 ARCWriterProcessor. So am not able to find the bug in my code.

Thanking Y=
ou,
Pankaj.
